user_query: Help me stay updated on the crypto market. Provide me with news articles about cryptocurrencies and Bitcoin from various sources like Yahoo Finance and Forbes.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest news articles about cryptocurrencies from Yahoo Finance.
Fetch the latest news articles about Bitcoin from Yahoo Finance.
Fetch the latest news articles about cryptocurrencies from Forbes.
Fetch the latest news articles about Bitcoin from Forbes.
Compile and summarize the fetched articles from all sources into a single report.
